'''V'''ision| former_affiliations = None| sister_stations = [[DXWW-TV]] ([[Radio Philippines Network|RPN]])| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 5,000 Watts| homepage = | }} '''DXTV-TV''', channel 13, is a station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]]. Its studios is located at Mindanao Media Center 2nd Flr., DPFI Bldg., Candelaria St., Davao City, and it's transmitter located at Barangay San Pedro, [[Davao City]]. == See also == * [[Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation]] {{Metro Davao TV}} [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1962]] [[Category:Television in Davao City]] [[Category:Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation stations]] [[Category:Television stations in the Philippines]] {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[ceb:DXTV-TV]] [[tl:DXTV-TV]]
